casebody.data:
[Coös,

June, 1879.] Twitchell & a. v. Upper Connecticut River & Lake Improvement Co. Shurtleff, Ladd, and Carpenter, for the plaintiffs. Aldrich Parsons, for the defendants.

Petition, for a reduction of tolls, which by the defendants’ charter (Laws, 1863, c. 2805) are to be established, and altered from time to time by this court as justice may require. By agree* ment a referee was appointed, and judgment was rendered on his report.
